com.mrcrayfish.device.api.app

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mrcrayfish.device.api.app.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    The notification class for the notification system. This class is intended to be used only on the server (logical and physical) side only. Typically you'd want to be able to send a notification to anyone on the server. There is two options to perform this, either create a background task on the server (a tick event) or send a Task from the client to the server. It is not possible to do this from the client side alone. If a notification is needed to be produced on the client side only, see ClientNotification
